page.shortlink: ux control properties frame begin properties frame pane class
page.description: Specify an optional class name for the frame pane. This property is only available if the *[ui:Frame type]* is 'Modern'.

discussion.p: The *[ui:Frame pane class]* property can be used to define one or more classes applied to the frame pane for a modern frame. The frame pane is the area that contains the contents of the frame.

ref.link: ux control properties frame begin properties frame border style
